DATA:
What a shame that this elevator is out of service...
They never work when you really need them!
I wonder when that became a trope in movies.

You'd think that we would have mastered them since
their original conception by Archimedes back in
236 BC!! I mean, come on!
Do I look like I want to climb a whole bunch of
stairs? I'd rather have my butt glued to a chair...

Hm, is says that we're on the ground level... 
Good to know, I guess.
